page.title: 01General Review of 03800369
page.content: This block is situated in the centre of Cheshire and the land is mainly used for dairy farming. It is a flat area, part of what is known as the {Cheshire Plain.}The housing is scattered and there are only two villages of any size in this block {Lower Withington}and part of {Siddington. To the north west corner of the block there is a large{sand quarrying operation which makes quite an impact on the environment, both while there is active quarrying and later when the excavation is allowed to fill with water. There are several small{hamlets scattered within the block, such as Withington Green, Smiths Green, Windyharbour and Siddington Heath.
